name: Comic Crash
description:
Pages from your comic book have been scattered throughout the city, and you have to find them! Play as Big Hand Man, Pea Shooter, and Jeff, 3 different characters with unique abilities who try to gather as many comic book pages and coins as they can. Fight small superheroes and avoid cars in this wacky collect-a-thon. Once you play the game, please help us out by filling out our questionnaire that will help us improve the game: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeATwKW4ILzRHrl4DLA-5_rgEPrdPgbaTArFlbz...

Controls:

W,A,S,D = Movement

E = switches between characters

Left Click = Attack

0,1,2 on numpad = Characters abilities (work in progress)

Q = Interact

mouse drag and scroll wheel = camera control
